description: LCM of (2^d - 1) where d runs over the degrees of irreducible factors of x^n + x + 1 over GF(2), divided by A046932(n).
links: Max Alekseyev, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1223
L. Bartholdi, Lamps, factorizations and finite fields, Amer. Math. Monthly, 107 (No. 5, 2000), 429-436.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 11 2000
extensions: Edited and extended by _Max Alekseyev_, Oct 19 2011
